articles.author: TMZ Staff
articles.title: 'America's Got Talent' Winner Michael Grimm Improving After Mystery Illness - TMZ
articles.description: Michael Grimm, famous for winning "America's Got Talent" season 5, is showing big signs of improvement after being hospitalized with a serious mystery health issue.
articles.content:
Michael Grimm, famous for winning "America's Got Talent" season 5, is showing big signs of improvement after being hospitalized with a serious, and mysterious, health issue.
